meta.title: Student Reviews - Edu.turkish
meta.description: Read real reviews from students and parents about admission to Turkish universities through Edu.turkish. Success stories and honest study experiences.

mediaReviews.title: Video and photo reviews
mediaReviews.description: Discover inspiring success stories from our students who have already realized their dream of studying in Turkey. In these video and photo reviews, they share their genuine impressions of the admission process, their first days at university, and the unique aspects of living in a new country.

achievements.title: Our achievements
achievements.description: We take pride in the results of our work, which reflect real assistance provided to hundreds of future professionals. Every figure in our statistics represents a confirmed success, backed by our team's diligent efforts and our students' determination.

shareExperience.title: Share your
shareExperience.description: Your personal experience is an invaluable resource for those just beginning their journey toward education in Turkey. Tell us about your admission process, the challenges you faced, and what helped you succeed to inspire other applicants.
